metadata.title: PM says undertaking Malaysiaâ€™s visit on invitation of PM Anwar Ibrahim

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 05 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday said that he is undertaking an official visit to Malaysia 5-7 October on the invitation of dear brother Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. "Greatly looking forward to a comprehensive exchange of views on our common desire to enhance trade & economic engagement as well as bilateral cooperation in various fields. Important global and regional matters will also be discussed. Pakistan Malaysia ties will continue to flourish. INSHALLAH," the prime minister said in a post on his X handle. https://x.com/cmshehbaz/status/1974700540828242356?s=46
